### `r h.i`.`r h.ii` Phenotype analysis
To investigate tumor heterogeneity, the tumor microenvironment was characterized using 14 phenotypic features provided in [`CancerSEA`](http://biocc.hrbmu.edu.cn/CancerSEA/).
